structure.unit: Return And Registry Of Births, Marriages And Deaths

law.catch_line: Penalty For Failure To Report Births And Deaths
law.text: A parent, keeper, superintendent or other person required by section six to give or cause to be given notice of a birth or death, neglecting so to do for ten days after the time limited therefor, and the master or commanding officer of a vessel neglecting so to do for ten days after the arrival of his vessel at the place where notice is to be given, shall forfeit not more than five dollars.
